entries.title: Color harmony: Text on backgrounds must meet WCAG AA (4.5:1) minimum
entries.description: Text on backgrounds must meet WCAG AA (4.5:1) minimum
entries.example: Always verify contrast ratios before applying color pairs

entries.title: Color harmony: Same color family requires 400+ shade difference
entries.description: If PRIMARY on PRIMARY → require |shade1 - shade2| >= 400
entries.why: PRIMARY[500] on PRIMARY[600] has insufficient contrast
entries.example: Good: PRIMARY[100] on PRIMARY[900] (800 step gap)
entries.counterExample: Bad: PRIMARY[200] on PRIMARY[500] (300 step gap)

entries.title: Color harmony: Use semantic tokens consistently
entries.description: text-primary, text-secondary, text-muted map to appropriate shades

entries.title: Color forbidden: Same family on itself without 400+ gap
entries.description: Insufficient contrast
entries.example: PRIMARY[300] on PRIMARY[500], NEUTRAL[400] on NEUTRAL[600]

entries.title: Color forbidden: Raw hex colors
entries.description: Breaks design system, not maintainable

entries.title: Color forbidden: Standard Tailwind colors
entries.description: Not design system tokens

entries.title: Depth layer: Elevated (depth 1)
entries.description: Use: Modals, dropdowns, highest elevation. Token: bg-elevated
entries.example: Shadow: shadow-lg. Light: neutral-50 or white

entries.title: Depth layer: Card (depth 2)
entries.description: Use: Primary cards, content containers. Token: bg-elevated
entries.example: Shadow: shadow-md. Light: neutral-50 or white

entries.title: Depth layer: Surface (depth 3)
entries.description: Use: Nested containers, sections. Token: bg-surface

entries.title: Depth layer: SurfaceHover (depth 4)
entries.description: Use: Hover states on surface. Token: bg-surfaceHover

entries.title: Depth layer: Page (depth 5)
entries.description: Use: Page background. Token: bg-page

entries.title: Depth anti-pattern: Page lighter than card
entries.description: Inverts depth perception. Fix: Use bg-page for page

entries.title: Depth anti-pattern: Elevated without shadow
entries.description: Looks flat despite bg. Fix: Add shadow-md or shadow-lg

entries.title: Depth anti-pattern: Raw colors for layers
entries.description: Breaks dark mode. Fix: Use semantic tokens

entries.title: Depth anti-pattern: Skip >2 shade steps
entries.description: Jarring contrast. Fix: Use intermediate layer

entries.title: Depth anti-pattern: Nested same-shade no border
entries.description: Elements merge. Fix: Add border or different shade

entries.title: Depth anti-pattern: Using bg-white for page
entries.description: Wrong in dark mode. Fix: Use bg-page

entries.title: Depth anti-pattern: Using bg-gray-* anywhere
entries.description: Not a design system token. Fix: Find semantic equivalent

entries.title: Dark mode semantic tokens
entries.description: background: page: light=white or cream, dark=PRIMARY[900]; surface: light=white, dark=PRIMARY[800]; surfaceHover: light=PRIMARY[50], dark=PRIMARY[700]; elevated: light=white, dark=PRIMARY[700]; inverse: light=PRIMARY[500], dark=white | text: primary: light=PRIMARY[500], dark=NEUTRAL[100]; secondary: light=NEUTRAL[500], dark=NEUTRAL[300]; disabled: light=NEUTRAL[300], dark=NEUTRAL[600]; inverse: light=white, dark=PRIMARY[500] | border: default: light=NEUTRAL[300], dark=NEUTRAL[600]; subtle: light=PRIMARY[100], dark=PRIMARY[800]; strong: light=PRIMARY[300], dark=PRIMARY[600]
